amendment.description: To modify certain provisions relating to cybersecurity.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2464, under the order of 8/4/2021, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 2. Record Vote Number: 301.

action.text: Amendment SA 2464 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 2137. (consideration: CR S5811, S5812; text: CR S5811) To modify certain provisions relating to cybersecurity.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2464 proposed by Senator Carper for Senator Peters to Amendment SA 2137.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2464, under the order of 8/4/2021, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 2. Record Vote Number: 301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2464, under the order of 8/4/2021, having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 96 - 2. Record Vote Number: 301.
